# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it as soon as possible.

- **Email:** mail@0xarchit.is-a.dev
- **GitHub Issues:** Please do not use GitHub Issues to report security vulnerabilities. Use email for confidential reports.

We will respond to your report promptly and keep you updated on the progress. Once the vulnerability is resolved, we will disclose the details responsibly.

> **Note:** Only the current v2.x version is under active consideration for security support. Older versions are not maintained.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ----------------- |
| 2.x     | :white_check_mark:|

## Security Best Practices
- Always keep your dependencies up to date.
- Never share your API keys or secrets publicly.
- Use strong, unique passwords for all accounts.

Thank you for helping keep this project and its users safe!
